summary: The Batman has returned after a 10-year absence. The Gotham authorities want to arrest him. An old foe wants a reunion. The Feds want the Man of Tomorrow to put a stop to him.
cast: Peter Weller|Ariel Winter|Michael Emerson|David Selby|Mark Valley|Carlos Alazraqui|Dee Bradley Baker|Paget Brewster|Maria Canals-Barrera|Townsend Coleman|Grey Griffin|Robin Atkin Downes|Greg Eagles|Michael Jackson|Danny Jacobs|Maurice LaMarche|Lex Lang|Yuri Lowenthal|Tress MacNeille|Michael McKean|Jim Meskimen|Jason Charles Miller|Conan O'Brien|Rob Paulsen|Andrea Romano|Tara Strong|James Patrick Stuart|Bruce Timm|Frank Welker|Gary Anthony Williams|Gwendoline Yeo|Andy Richter
title: Batman: El Regreso del Caballero Oscuro. Segunda Parte
